author: Brenda Goh
title: China's Wuhan marks sombre Tomb Sweeping festival amid coronavirus
description: Each year for the tomb sweeping festival, Wuhan resident Dai Jinfeng drives with her mother to a nearby cemetery to pay respects to their ancestors. The coronavirus has changed that ritual this year.
content:
WUHAN, China (Reuters) - Each year for the tomb sweeping festival, Wuhan resident Dai Jinfeng drives with her mother to a nearby cemetery to pay respects to their ancestors. The coronavirus has changed that ritual this year. 
Also known as Qingming, the fest… [+3262 chars]
